content.detailedDescription: I was in my parked car with my boyfriend, talking. we were outside of my brothers house waiting for him to come home. while i was talking i noticed what i thought was a larger and brighter than usual "star".  i even stopped and mentioned it to my boyfriend but he didn't  think much of it.  i couldn't stay focused in our conversation because i kept looking back at the bright star. i knew it wasn't an airplane because it was not moving it was just there but it was so bright and larger than a regular star. my boyfriend and i continued talking and maybe like 20 minutes passed when i looked back up and noticed the star had moved. it was lower than when i first saw it and it wasn't like a little lower it had moved enough for me to notice it right away. i pointed that out to my boyfriend but he really didn't think much of it and i don't think he had really looked at it anyway. i didn't actually see it move because i took my eyes off of it for a little bit. it was stationary or hovered in place. i ended up getting out of the car and going inside the house because my brother got home. i don't know what happened to it and i didn't go back to check on it, though i kept thinking about it and now wish i would've grabbed some benaculurs. i looked up sightings in my area and found a few stories of people reporting seeing the same thing these past few months.
content.summary: Star like bright object hovering then moved directions

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard talking to my wife. i leaned back and happened to noticed 7 lights in the sky that appeared to me to be the constellation "orion". i immediately knew something was wrong. orion should not be visible on a clear blue day and not in that location as i see it in the south early in the morning when i leave for work. also in that same instant, i noticed they were moving south. i then sprang from my chair to run in to the house an yell at my other family members to come and see the "ufos" i was witnessing. they all ran outside and also witnessed the lights and we could now only see 4 and they had changed formation similar to half of an octagon. then 3 lights hovered in one spot while the fourth made a turn toward the west. it then turned back toward us and then suddenly an additional light came streaking across the sky and disappeared out of sight below the tree tops. the speed made me think of a bullet.I then noticed that all but one of the lights were gone. it appeared to slowly get smaller as if it were going away from me and became impossible to see. one family member phoned a friend and told tell her to come out and see if she could see anything. while on the phone we began to observe more lights coming out of the north. shortly there after my son and i witnessed another light streaking across the sky. i was extremely happy to have another person witness what i had seen earlier. we were then informed by the person we had called, that they had just witnessed a streaking light across the sky. several family members along with myself witnessed many lights with time elapsing in between sightings over a period of approximately an hour an forty five minutes. we were finally able to photograph three of the objects. you will have to magnify the image to see them. it simply doesn't show any detail. it is as we saw them "white lights" in the sky. through binoculars it somewhat appeared as if there was a dark ring around the object.It was somewhat blurred. the objects for the most part moved slower than airplane speed which could be observed at the same time. they all eventually left our area to every direction except north. i know this sounds crazy but, we can not explain what we saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple lights in the sky that changed direction and displayed speed like never witnessed before

content.detailedDescription: A few friends of mine and i driving to drop one of them off, i was sitting in the back seat in the middle, when i looked behind my buddy's head, when i saw it, my eyes widened. i poked my friend, he turned around and we were both in awe. it was a large, blue, flaming with tentacle like flames. we all looked forward, then back repetitiously. it was going the same speed with the car, just following us. the first thing i said was "that's a buckin' ufo!"then, it just disappeared ( like most ufos).
content.summary: Blue flaming disk following car, multiple witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I was volunteering at the ada platform for disabled fans at the acl festival. the cure was playing and i had been monitoring the cloud cover as we were expecting a heavy downpour and i wanted to be prepared for the rain.

many people on the platform noticed the lights and several people took pictures and video of the lights as they hovered and slowly moved west. one person said they were chinese lanterns. they did have the apparent glow of candle but they also remained in a triangle formation during the entire event.

the lights remained in a triangle formation and eventually disappeared into the cloud cover. at first i was very excited and could not believe my eyes. i even pointed it out to other patrons and workers. once i was told it was chinese lanterns i let my excitement wane. i did not take any images as i knew my camera phone would not capture what i was seeing. 

there must be 100's of people that saw this...
content.summary: They could have been chinese lanterns but the triangle formation was constant,, orange lights at each point of triangle. slowly heading west- gliding underneath clouds.

content.detailedDescription: It was saturday night, oct 12, 2013 around 8:45 pm. my next door neighbor called me scared to death, screaming saying," go outside now and look in the sky. now!". with her still on the phone i ran out my front door and into my front yard and looked up in the sky to see bright orange, round lights in multitudes in the sky. there was one set of 4 in a diamond shape, then a set of 3 in the shape of a triangle right behind, then a set of 2 side by side each other behind the triangle one. then in the distance ( i was looking towards the north sky, they were moving north to south) there was another cluster of about 6 to 7 more coming. i screamed for my husband to come outside. he and my two daughters saw them, along with 3 of my neighbors. the whole experience lasted around maybe 7-8 minutes. then as they approached this big ridge, which is about 25ft from my back porch, they disappeared. i came inside with my neighbor still on the phone with me and called our local law enforcement on my cell phone. there was nothing going on in the area to account for what we all had witnessed. i was scared to death. my one daughter started crying, while my other daughter was silent but shaking. it looked like something straight out of a movie. i really thought this was it , and we were being invaded. neither my husband nor i have been able to sleep since it happened. both my daughters are scared to leave our house now and have trouble sleeping. i tried to catch it on video on my phone but it happened so fast that i couldn't.
content.summary: Saw 20-30 bright orange, circular shaped objects in the sky in sets of groups in different formations,.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard loosely scanning the sky when i saw the object. i noticed the object because there were not many clouds in the sky, only trails left behind from other air traffic. i noticed the object because it was more oval shape, almost mix of an egg or circular in nature. there was no trail being left behind from this object like every other plane in the sky. i first thought the object in question might have been a balloon, but the elevation of the object was around the same or higher than air traffic. the object was going along more or less a particular path, no sudden movements, no sudden change in the opposite or different direction. there was a sort of reflection off the object from the sun, colors were white/silver/grey. was very hard to make out a true shape of the object as it almost seemed to morph in nature, hence the balloon theory. i was extremely confused, felt indifferent, knew this was an unknown object as i was observing it. the event lasted for about 8-10 minutes as it was in the sky, it headed toward some clouds or emissions left from other planes. i went to the front of my house to see if i could get a better look, by this time from my backyard which was about 10 seconds in between both points, i had lost sight of the object, went to my backyard again. no object in sight at this point, scanned the clouds, nothing to be seen. the last moment i saw the object it was entering the left over trails/stretched clouds - moving at a very slow rate and then vanished.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Saw object traveling across the sky, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just finished lunch and it was 1:45pm and we were on our way heading north on interstate 5 when i observed a funny looking bright object in the sky out of the passengers side of window.I asked the person riding with me to keep an eye on the object and when it went from 1 to 2 objects and the person made the comment that one of the objects changed shape and that a picture was being taken of the objects so as soon as the picture was taken the objects separated a little more and then vanished. the interesting part is that when we looked at the picture that was taken with an i phone we noticed tiny little orbs around each object that we couldn't see with the naked eye and when enlarged you could make out the bigger objects as bright saucer shape.
there were no other aircraft visible in the sky at the time of these sightings.The weather was clear with no clouds.
content.summary: While driving north on interstate 5 noticed objects out of passenger window

content.detailedDescription:
In lavonia outside in the backyard looking at the stars. k saw a few planes mo e through the sky when i notices  stationary sphere with blinkinv colorful lights. i called my boyfriend
outside to see what i was seeing. he then brought out binoculars where we could cleag observe the difference betweenands, stars and planets. the ufo likened to an el
electrical explosion of rainbow intermittent colors that elongated. video & pics taken...
content.summary: Bright blinking stationary ufo

content.detailedDescription:
In lavonia outside in the backyard looking at the stars. k saw a few planes mo e through the sky when i notices  stationary sphere with blinkinv colorful lights. i called my boyfriend
outside to see what i was seeing. he then brought out binoculars where we could cleag observe the difference betweenands, stars and planets. the ufo likened to an el
electrical explosion of rainbow intermittent colors that elongated. video & pics taken...
content.summary: Bright blinking stationary ufo

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside talking when an organge/red light started falling from a high altitude.  it looked like a firework burning out.  we watched it decend and it broke into 3 equally spaced orbs and kept decending.  i assumed it was just breaking apart as it decended.  then the orbs stopped decending and hovered.  they began blinking on/off randomly.  then there were 4.  they then began moving around laterally.  this kept up for a few seconds.  suddenly they all came back together and then disappeared (essentially went out).  prior to this occurance, my friend his wife and another person said they had seen the largest falling star they had ever seen.  unfortunately, i did not witness this because i was looking in the other direction.
content.summary: Single light orb splits into four

content.detailedDescription:
Im not too shure what this is, perhaps it may pe a bright star or even a planet hovering over the southwest sky close to midway airport.

please varify this for me

thank you
content.summary: Star-like unknown object hovered southwest sky

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from a movie theater. my younger brother said, what are those orange lights in the sky. my girlfriend and i looked up and saw 3 orange lights in the air. the lights were orange and stationary. as we drove down the road the lights didn't move. minutes later the triangle of orange lights disappeared. i'm not sure what the lights were!
content.summary: 3 orange lights hovered in sky. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were in the woods at one of my favorite fishing holes having a bbq.  when we were cleaning up after the bbq i told my daughter to look up at the beautiful blue sky.  as i said that looking west i notice an object flying over the tree tops toward us.  there were 5 of us and our dog that witness this event.  the object had a shape to it, but was see true.  it seem to have a white glow to it , but you could see true it.  my girlfriend asked is that a plane when the object was directly over head, and as she ask that question the object while continuing its direction of travel turnt 180 and continued eastward without a sound till we couldn't see it anymore because of the trees on the other side if the river. it was 20 degrees celcius .  not a cloud in the sky.  i've been a amateur astronomer for many years, and never seen something unexplained before.  i really don't know what this object is.
content.summary: Perfect blue sky. having a bbq with the family when object flu over ours heads and then while flying in a straight line did a 180.  object was see true.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i often sit in our meadow along the platte river and watch the sky after deer hunting. we have both seen several things over the years and attribute that to the fact that we actually pay attention to the sky. i have "the night sky" app on my cell phone to help identify planets, satellites, and things we don't recognize.
   saturday night at approx. 8:15 pm, 10-12-13, give or take ten or fifteen minutes, we noticed a very bright light in the north rising on the horizon. this unusually bright light caught our attention but we then looked away as my son had to blow his nose. this did not take very long, and when he was done he noticed the light had risen a lot in that thirty seconds or so. he called my attention to it and we began watching it rise higher and higher very fast. it seemed to be going mostly north to south with maybe a slight south westerly heading of a few degrees. when it was 1/4th the way from horizon to directly overhead it was apparent it was even more odd. the light was so large and bright for an object seemingly so high in the sky, it obscured the craft. i used my night sky app to identify the thing. here is one curiosity, the object,(or a satellite near it was called rb- something/something with a 14 in it. then suddenly the light which was five to ten times the size and brightness of a bright planet like venus was that night which was setting a few degrees south of straight west, this light suddenly flashed brighter and dimer about four or five times almost like a camera flash, then it went out. i was still looking at the app on my phone which now no longer showed the satellite. i moved the phone to the south and the satellite number now was low in the south. the object was still where it was with a very dim front light now and lights began appearing in the rear of it. by dim i mean almost not visible. the rear lights began to be visible as it passed overhead heading south. eventually they were shown to be two big rectangle white lights on the rear. no red, no flashing, no other lights. this object was huge and high enough i would say out of the atmosphere. about fifteen or twenty degrees passed directly up to the south an airliner (standard type airline visible high up passed under this thing and the size difference was incredible. one of the rear rectangle lights was twice the length or more of the airliner. considering the fact that it must have been a very long high distance above the plane that makes it two large to imagine. my guess would be a half mile wide at the very least but that's speculation. this object continued to go in a straight line to the south never descending as it would following the horizon. it just went directly in a straight line never lowering at about 50 deg. above horizon till it was not visible any longer. the only way it could have done that was to leave earth and keep going out into space. it took at least five minutes till we could not make out the lights any more. wish we would have had binoculars. this was a really strange occurrence.
  imagine an airliner at 50 deg above south horizon going left to right. it would be small against the night sky and hundreds of miles away maybe 1/16th inch at arms length long. then this thing going south and at the point they meet from your vantage point one of the rear lights on this object, much much higher than the plane, is three times the length of the plane. not knowing the distance difference but knowing the plane is a high one that makes the width across the rear of the unknown craft 6 to 7 times minimum the length of the airliner jet a 757 at least in my estimation.
   i admit without knowing actual distances all is speculation as to actual size. this leaves two main points that deem this sighting worthy of being reported. 1.- the very size of the thing. 2.- the way it just stayed at the approximate same height to the south, 50 deg. up), and then just continues off and away from earth not lowering to the horizon. lastly not included in the reasons above but worth mentioning is the fact the night sky app on my phone seemed to id this thing as a satellite then not then it id'ed a different thing as that satellite after it was high enough that the front light was not needed to obscure it any longer, but this is just my take on being "curious".
content.summary: Large craft travels north horizon, overhead then staight south without lowering into space

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was sky watching from our yard on mount desert island in maine when she came and got me around 7pm, to come look at something she could not identify.  i came outside to look.  it was a ball of pulsating light northwest from my position on the island would put the object somewhere north of bangor maine or possible washington county,  maybe cherryfield.  it was at least 20 miles away.  it was about the size of a large pea from our perspective.  it was very high above the tree line to where it could have been a plane or even a helicopter.  however,  it stayed in the exact same place,  not getting farther away or closer,  for over an hour at least.  it hovered and pulsated three distinct colors in order, green,  red,  "white".  the entire object.  it moved slightly up and down,  left to right and diagonally.  then would return to it's hovering spot. it's movements were not like any helicopter i have seen.  no plane hovers and moves like that.  that i know of.  i could not explain it.  i watched it with my daughter for about an hour and she remained watching for another hour or so.  it was still there at 9pm october 13,  2013. i did note this morning when i checked there was a similar sighting south of us over biddeford at 3am the morning of oct 13.  sounds like they saw the same thing we saw.  we did not witness a beam of light though. my husband saw it as well,  he is a marine with flight experience and he could not identify it either.
content.summary: Ufo orb of light over downeast maine

content.detailedDescription:
Been having trouble sleeping. decided to go outside. while standig looking at the stars in front of me (to the east) something drew my attention out of the corner of my eye. i turned to see a very fast bright white object flying nearly directly above me. this thing was fast. it appeared as bright as the brightest star in the sky, larger than the 'visible' stars but not twinkling. it did wink out once or twice as it flew overhead. i was watching it as it soared across the sky and it ever so slightly began turning in an arc. then it suddenly went back to the original path it was on. 

i've seen planes and various objects in the sky before but i've never seen anything flying this fast. it covered the visible area in the sky in about 
one minute (max) before it was out of sight.


then shortly after that one, i'd say about 5 minutes later, i saw another object (star-like but un blinking) moving through the sky as well. considerably slower than the first one. this one was not bright white, but had a tinge of yellow/orange to it. this one passed basically in the same area of the sky (above me) but then seemed to wink out.
content.summary: Very fast moving light

content.detailedDescription: From balboa park in van nuys, ca. i watched a white orb fly over sparse clouds at a steady speed from north to south. i was laying on my back on the grass in the park. soon thereafter, a larger and brighter orb appeared,  flew in an irregular path, would hover and change direction. i observed this object approach from an easterly direction move almost overhead and shift and stall in a zig zag fashion south/ southwesterly direction until it faded from view. as i was leaving the park i noticed a peculiar phenomena: as the sun was setting behind me in the west, i noticed what looked like a "false" sunrise happening in the east. what appeared as rays of light and shadow extending upwards from in front of the san gabriel mountain range. from on top of a hill i took a short video of the phenomen with my camera on my phone. after reviewing the video, i caught something at 9seconds into the video flying from mid left ascending at high velocity. this object appears dark and is moving too fast to be conventional aircraft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From the park i spotted a small orb fly over the clouds, soon followed by a larger, brighter, orb that moved irregular and would appear to hold stationery.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to smoke a cigarette with my boyfriend i'm my backyard and look southwest to see a saucer shaped object in our view. the lights were rotating around the ship with blue, white, and red lights. it clearly was not a plane or helicopter because it did not make any noise and it was not moving - just hovering. we stayed out to watch it until it slowly backed away out of our reach. very strange
content.summary: Not the first time i have seen a ufo by my house. this one was right out back of our house.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
one night in 1970, more than 40 years ago while i attended the now closed nathaniel hawthorne college, in antrim nh; i was returning from a drive into town with some dorm mates after a party.
we arrived in 2 cars and parked in our small parking lot that we shared with the dorm next door.I lived in the c.A.P. dorm .
our campus was 900 isolated acres on top of a mountain with only a few developed acres for buildings.
my dorm was on the edge of a large forest,very isolated with 100's of acres  of undeveloped forest behind us.
we always would look up at the spectacular night sky to see the constellations and the milky way. very clear visuals ,no pollution or street lights.No clouds.
that night at the party, we had been discussing a sighting several nights earlier by the girl's dorm.
the whole school was aware that they claimed that a ufo had landed on the great lawn in front of their new dorm.
nobody believed them. we did not have a description of that ufo, but the police had been called to investigate.
i was kidding around with my friends about the incident, there were about 10 of us in the parking lot, and as i said "goodnight, we haven't seen anything unusual."
 at that instant.
we looked up at the tree line separating the lot from the woods and we immediately saw that the stars were missing in an enormous black void in the shape of a triangle rising up in the near distance, at that moment when i said "look!", we simultaneously saw these orange, small circular lights on the perimeter of the triangle and it started to descend above us and get larger. i could not distinguish any surface reflections, just the lights separated it from the blackness.
basically it was a triangle of yellow-orange lights spaced apart.
it remained stationary for awhile, as if it was observing us.
it was hard to tell the size, it seemed to be smaller at first, it eventually took up my entire field of vision. 
no sounds except us yelling at each other to confirm what we were seeing.
i did not feel frightened, more shocked at the coincidence that we had just mentioned the previous incident and here was this strange giant object over  our heads near the woods.
i felt at the time as if we had summoned it.
none of us had ever seen anything like it.
most ufo descriptions of the time were always these flying discs, like frisbees. this was not like anything i imagined at the time a ufo would look like.
after a few minutes the lights got smaller as it seemed that the black triangle was moving away on an angle.
we split into 2 groups; my dorm and the other dorm said goodnight to each other and never reported the incident, because we saw how the girls were ridiculed for their earlier sighting.
i have told friends and family of this incident, but i never reported it.
i've always been convinced that since the government did not have stealth technology in 1970, and there was no sound , plus the fact that we felt it appeared to be observing us and hovering, that it was a ufo.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: We were returning to our 2 dorms that shared a parking lot that bordered on the woods. i looked up at the night sky and saw that most the stars were blocked by a large black shape that had orange lights forming a triangle. totally silent.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my window and i seen these 2 bright golden brown light orbs flying in the sky they stoped then they just keeped on going did not get a picture or video i don't own any of these things but im going to now in all my life i all ways want to see them now i have i wish i just got a picture of one but i think they will be back some time i hope well that's all i got to say thank you
content.summary: 2 bright orbs brown golden color

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were just pulling into a pumpkin farm. he said to me, " that's a strange place for one single cloud"... as he was looking up towards the sun just to the west of it. there wasn't a cloud in the sky. it was about 3:30p.M.On the 13th of october. i then looked up, and saw what he was talking about. it looked like a very short contrail off of an airplane, or like an odd shaped thin elongated cloud. i responded saying it was just a contrail from an airplane. we then dismissed it, and carried on our pumpkin picking at the farm. later, after we had left the farm, and traveled to another nearby city to run some errands, we were finally heading back home. we had just gotten onto hwy16 traveling west when my boyfriend again noticed this "cloud". it was still in the exact same spot, in the exact same "cloud shape", oddly enough a few hrs had passed, and this "cloud was still in it's exact position just west of the sun. by this time, it was about 6p.M. this is where we were absolutely astonished by what we were witnessing. at first, my thought was... omg is this comet ison? what the hell is that?! as we watched this a little more closely, we observed it suddenly brighten like a star, and the trail that looked like a contrail began to fade simultaniously as the light faded with it. it became completely invisible for a few seconds when a faint light could be seen. then it became bright again, along with the trail still in the same shape that it was before. again, it brightened, the trail visible, then faded out. then we noticed from the south a plane became visible in our view. it was on a direct path towards this object. as the plane got closer to the object it very smoothly and rapidly headed on a southwest direction. again fading as it went cruising off until it disappeared completely. i have seen a couple of sighting before, but at night. this was my first day time sighting, and the most undoubtedly, unquestionable sighting yet. i have no doubt that what we witnessed was def not of this earth. i thought it was exciting, and amazing. truly a rare treat!
content.summary: Spotted "strip of cloud" noticed it 3 hrs later in same spot. light brightened then dimmed, had trail behind it. did this a few times

content.detailedDescription:
Reporting for a friend who does not have computer access:

"my dad and i were getting ready for work when my mother called us outside to see a meteor shower.  both of us came out and saw the lights but realized it was not a meteor shower but lights blinking on and off in a stationary position.  the three of us continued to stare at the object. there was not a sound coming from it.  i sent my dad in to get a pair of binoculars and we looked at the object carefully with them.  we discovered the lights were not blinking on and off as we thought but were dimming and then brightening. when they were dim you could not see them with the naked eye. the lights circled a disk shaped black mass that seemed to create a void space in the sky yet at times it seemed almost tranparent.  all of the lights appeared to be white there was one white light on the top as we were able to view it as it left.  after about ten to twelve minutes the object started to move directly north toward town.  it moved slowly with no sound. it looked like it just floated away. since there was nothing to use as a reference i would guess it was between 50' and 100' in diameter.  as it moved north, it appeared to be almost at tree top level around 60' to 100' and the body seemed to turn translucent looking like a frosted glass. total time viewed was about fifteen to eighteen minutes."

all three witnesses are mature, level-headed adults who wish to remain anonymous.  the man reporting the incident has always been skeptical about ufo reports.
content.summary: Blinking lights on craft over house then moved north to tree line.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were walking south on simcoe passing bruce street when we saw 3 lights in the sky south of us. i quickly pulled out my phone to take a pic, i got a pic of the triangle with a light at each point. the lights were white and it seemed like the object was changing direction and angle because one light disappeared then a second then finally the 3rd. he has video he recorded on his phone i will acquire when i see him next. we were both shocked. from seeing it to it dis a vanished took about 2 mins.
content.summary: Triangle with a white light at each point. seen south from simcoe and bruce

content.detailedDescription: I live in a rural area ,the sky was dark and i was in the yard smoking a cigarette. i looked up and saw a circle of bright light, as bright as moon. moving south to north at a high rate of speed. there was no blinking lights, and it was a clear night. very unusual to see this as i often watch the sky for airplanes coming and going towards the asheville,north carolina area far in distance over mountains. i was dumbstruck couldn't turn away .I watched it for approx. 4 to 5 minutes,then it just went away. never seen anything that bright and round and large that high in sky before. it made me nervous and excited ,and i checked internet for any other witness.Nobody will listen or believe me. i know what i have seen,no way that was normal.I have a small business and a family and was in the army, i don't want attention, just answers.
content.summary: Large bright orb high in sky moving very fast over greeneville,tn.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the deck smoking a cigar and drinking a beer when i noticed several objects in the sky. my wife had come home from work and she noticed them also. i have seen these objects before. objects were flying very fast at times, changing directions, hovering. got the camera and took pictures. tried the video camera also. i took over 200 pics, some good some not so good.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: White luminesent objects flying around. one dark red object stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to walk the dogs for the night just like every other night. i live in an apartment complex and walk the dogs in a grassy area between the buildings. while walking i looked up at the sky and noticed a bright light in the sky. the light at first appeared to be stationary but then began moving in what looked to be in the opposite direction at about a 45* angle. the object began swaying back and forth from left to right while continuing to move forward in a straight line. the object was visable for approx 5 mins before disappearing behind the apartment building across from mine. at the same time there were multiple aircraft in the area that were also visible due to an airport in the area. my first thought was that it was just another airplane, but then i thought to myself that it was strange how none of the others were just 1 solid bright white light. all the other aircraft were the typical blinking blue/red lights and were moving perfectly straight. the object i saw had no blinking/flashing lights.  after i lost sight of the object i just stared at the sky and felt very confused, wondering if i had actually just whitnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Bright light appeared to sway from left to right while traveling in a straight path

content.detailedDescription: I saw a large orange light which i watched hover for 1 minute.  4 projectiles with a tail seemed to shhot from this object heading west away from me.  the large light then disappeared.  the 4 projectiles then disappeared.  a few seconds later, 3 lights forming a triangle appeared one by one and then a 4 lit to form a square.  they pulsated randomly on and off and moved from side to side before all 4 eventually fading.
content.summary: Single light, split into 4 lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on cole street. noticed movement through top window of jeep. clear night, relatively no clouds at approx 8:15 pm. 4 translucent lights moved in a circle as if chasing each other about 2x then all 4 met in the middle one by one then dispersed back into circular chasing.  husband and i watched until we drove out of sight. approx 6-8 months ago witnessed similar sighting facing towards delphos area. that sighting was one light traveling in a circle for 2 hours. the lights in both were translucent and could see the clouds behind them and look projected from above the clouds but was not an advertising light. i am curious and kind of scared due to there being no explanation for either sighting.
content.summary: 4 translucent lights spun counter clockwise then one by one would meet in the middle then spread back out. the lights didn't appear to be on an object. this was my second sighting in different location in lima within 6 months.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the cure at  austin city limits music fehtial. the lights appeared overhead. there were three lights in the shape of an equilateral triangle. we first noiced this around 9 pm. my wife saw the lights fly in formation making them appear to be a triangle. we both saw it stop and hold a position. then daphne saw the lights move apart and fly away. i initially thought it was gong to be part of the light show. then i thought it was drones. we discussed this with four other people around us. we all saw it. it was not part of the show.
content.summary: Triangle  of lights over the cure show at acl festival austin october 2013. moved then hovered. 3lights moved apart., then left

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photo at night of a rare car when i noticed in the north east distance there was a strange pulsating orb traveling south. at first i just assumed it was a plane... but as i kept looking i realized it was round and just sort of floating. it caused a strange low frequency humming in my ears as it neared. it quickly changed direction and headed east towards the mountains and faded away. tried to take a photo or video but my phone would not do it. the guy in the car i was photographing also could not get his car to start. both my phone and his car worked fine after the orb disappeared. he said he wanted nothing to do with "this s**t" and took off.
content.summary: Glowing orange/white/pink/yellow orb floated through the sky (like a high altitude plane), quickly changed direction and faded away
